description: This file provides utility functions for building SQL query fragments, including pagination and filtering clauses for transactions, likely used within a larger backend API for handling database queries.

methods.name: buildPagination({ limit = 50, offset = 0 })
methods.description: Generates SQL limit and offset clause with corresponding parameters.

methods.name: buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category })
methods.description: Creates WHERE clause and parameters for filtering transactions by account, date range, and category.

ctags.name: buildTransactionFilters
ctags.pattern: /^export function buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category }) {$/
